com.percussion.cas
Class PSModifyRelatedContent

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSDefaultExtension
      com.percussion.cas.PSModifyRelatedContent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSRequestPreProcessor
public class PSModifyRelatedContent
extends PSDefaultExtension
implements IPSRequestPreProcessor

This exit handles all active assembly actions which modify the relationship tables. The exit does all the work through the active assembly proxy processor and is attached to the dummy update sys_rxSupport/updaterelateditems. This approacch is taken to keep the interface used for all active assembly update functionality.

getSlotType

public static PSSlotType getSlotType(int slotid,
                                     IPSRequestContext request)
                              throws PSCmsException
Get the slot type for the supplied parameters.

Parameters:
slotid - the slotid for which to get the slot type object.
request - the request used to lookup the slots, assumed not null.
Returns:
the slot type object or null if none was found for the supplied slotid.
Throws:
PSCmsException - for any error looking up the slot types.

getActiveItemInfo

public static Document getActiveItemInfo(IPSRequestContext request)
                                  throws PSExtensionProcessingException
This is a helper function that gets the XML document that gives the contentid and revision of the parent item from the relateditemid in the request. This function makes an internal request to a Rhythmyx resource in sys_rcSupport application.

Parameters:
request - must not be null.
Returns:
the result document that has contentid and revisionid of the parent item, may be null.
Throws:
PSExtensionProcessingException - for any error.
